name: monorepo-nestjs-react
description: NestJs and React App with monorepo

scripts.build-fe: cd client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build-be: cd ../server && npm i && npm run build && npm run start:prod
scripts.build: npm run build-fe && npm run build-be
